page.title: 13OUR DAY CONTINUED
page.content:
It's not all PE and GAMES (unfortunately). We also have to do academic work too
It's not so bad though because it usually all revolves around a{topic or{project
For example when we started the{DAILY {PE}we did a project called{jimmy on {the road to superhealth}
This involved research into smoking glue sniffing and diet. It therefore incorporated all our subjects (maths,creative writing,functional writing,expressive writing and science) all on the one topic.
It really makes learning fun and more meaningful
